LanguageData.SY_CL.TooltipHandAdditionalCleans: Number of additional cleaning cycles executed per installed vacuum hand
LanguageData.SY_CL.TooltipHandAdditionalSpeed: Cleaning is sped up through adding this value to the "work done" value. Therefore added speed increase gets lower with higher values: For example, if the required total work to clean a tile is 30 it takes 30 ticks to clean the tile (1 work done / tick). With an added value of 0.25 this is reduced to 24 ticks (1.25 work done / tick), 0.5 reduces it to 20, 1.0 to 15, 1.5 to 12, 2 to 10 ticks and so on.
LanguageData.SY_CL.TooltipFootAdjacentCleans: Number of cleaning cycles executed on adjacent filth per installed mop foot A single cycle may not be enough to fully clean a tile, but already speed up cleaning greatly
LanguageData.SY_CL.TooltipWarCrimesMode: Adds an adjustable mood debuff per installed cleaning limb if enabled
LanguageData.SY_CL.TooltipHorribleLimbsMoodEffect: The strength of the mood debuff per part if cleaning limbs are set to be horrible
LanguageData.SY_CL.TooltipHandPartEfficiency: Adjusts the part efficiency of the vacuum hand (requires reloading)
LanguageData.SY_CL.TooltipFootPartEfficiency: Adjusts the part efficiency of the mop foot (requires reloading)
